label: オペレーションコードネーム生成表

Codename Generator - Adjective.name: コードネーム生成 - 形容詞
Codename Generator - Adjective.description: Generate part of an operation codename, getting an adjective to use for it.

Codename Generator - Color.name: コードネーム生成 - カラー
Codename Generator - Color.description: Generate part of an operation codename, getting a color to use for it.

Codename Generator - Noun.name: コードネーム生成 - 名詞
Codename Generator - Noun.description: Generate part of an operation codename, getting a noun to use for it.

Codename Generator - Phonetic.name: コードネーム生成 - フォネティック
Codename Generator - Phonetic.description: Generate part of an operation codename, getting a phonetic callsign to use for it.

Codename Part Combinations.name: コードネーム要素の組み合わせ
Codename Part Combinations.description: Determine what roll tables to use to build a random code name.
